title: Goat Simulator Waste of Space
summary: Be the first goat in space!
description: You've already been through the zombie apocalypze in Goat Z and made friends with NPCs in the computed world of Goat MMO Simulator. What on earth is there left for you to do? The answer is NOTHING! Thats why we leave earth behind and travel to space!Be a space goat and build a space colony by headbutting people and taking their money. Who knows best how to spend it but a goat? Build a Command bridge training simulator, a space museum or even your very own spaceship. Shoot down asteroids and space pirates or travel to a nearby planet. You no longer have to fantasize about colonizing space as a simulated goat. Your dreams have finally come true! Includes a Valentine themed level and love(ly) goats. Key features* Be the first goat in space* Crowdfund a space colony and get other people to pay for it and do all the work!* Fly and shoot stuff in space, because nobody makes games about flying and shooting in space anymore* Endless space full of planets to visit. but seriously it would take forever to go there so why bother* There is one planet nearby though. Go to that one* Learn how to be a real bridge commander like that spock dude from mars or whatever* The biggest map in goat simulator history* So much content you will have to charge your phone lots of times* Tons of unlockable goats with special powers - Create black holes, 3D print stuff in the world and fling people with your mind
descriptionHTML:
You've already been through the zombie apocalypze in Goat Z and made friends with NPCs in the computed world of Goat MMO Simulator. What on earth is there left for you to do? The answer is NOTHING! Thats why we leave earth behind and travel to space!

Be a space goat and build a space colony by headbutting people and taking their money. Who knows best how to spend it but a goat? Build a Command bridge training simulator, a space museum or even your very own spaceship. Shoot down asteroids and space pirates or travel to a nearby planet.

You no longer have to fantasize about colonizing space as a simulated goat. Your dreams have finally come true!

Includes a Valentine themed level and love(ly) goats.


Key features

* Be the first goat in space
* Crowdfund a space colony and get other people to pay for it and do all the work!
* Fly and shoot stuff in space, because nobody makes games about flying and shooting in space anymore
* Endless space full of planets to visit. but seriously it would take forever to go there so why bother
* There is one planet nearby though. Go to that one
* Learn how to be a real bridge commander like that spock dude from mars or whatever
* The biggest map in goat simulator history
* So much content you will have to charge your phone lots of times
* Tons of unlockable goats with special powers - Create black holes, 3D print stuff in the world and fling people with your mind
comments: I love It but can you fix the glitch where when my tab shuts of the money in the bank thing doesn't reset because I think you should get a cool goat for filling it up
IS COOL YOU CAN BLOW UP THE ZOMBIE WORLD LIKE THE PEOPLE FLOAT ON SPACE ON THE SPACE (not really) DOWNLOAD IT
I like it A LOT but it takes Forever to install I uninstalled almost ALL  my games but it's still taking a while. Great game!
Omg this game every time I press it it will say unfortunately goat simulator has stopped plzzzz fix
Best game ever u drag people around with ur tongue and get new and hilarious goats
The goat can drive lol and you can hit people and drag them around.
recentChanges: Asking someone out with the latest in space romancing technology is as easy as red, blue and green! Wait a minute...Goats are colorblind? Crap.
* Romance people by spamming your favourite color like in that other space game
* Spread love to unlock four lovely new goats
* Get married and spend eternity with anything. We don’t judge
* Swipe left to divorce. Everybody knows how
* Find out what love really is
* What is love? We don’t know. This is just a game silly
